adrFormatAddress: 117 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Mikey for a decade plus. Manye & Lev I knew for a while. Great people, always a fun experience. Greats conversations. Highly recommend coming to the barbershop for a fresh cut.

text.text: I’ve been seeing Mikey for a decade plus. Manye & Lev I knew for a while. Great people, always a fun experience. Greats conversations. Highly recommend coming to the barbershop for a fresh cut.

originalText.text:
Great shop, excellent quality barbers! Clean, professional, precise with the blades & sim issues, and able to do a wide range of different styles. Mike is an excellent barber - anything from low fades, high skin fades, scissor haircuts, comb overs, pick your trend or classic style, Mike can do it.
Cuts & fades available, razor blade shape ups, and hot towels for the finale.

text.text:
Great shop, excellent quality barbers! Clean, professional, precise with the blades & sim issues, and able to do a wide range of different styles. Mike is an excellent barber - anything from low fades, high skin fades, scissor haircuts, comb overs, pick your trend or classic style, Mike can do it.
Cuts & fades available, razor blade shape ups, and hot towels for the finale.

originalText.text:
If you're in the market for more than just a haircut, AMG Barbershop in the West Village is the spot to visit. Nestled in a charming area, this establishment offers more than just a trim; it's an experience. From the moment you step through the door, you're greeted with a vibrant atmosphere that sets the tone for what's to come.

Manye, my go-to barber at AMG, consistently delivers exceptional service with a side of entertainment. His witty banter and engaging conversations keep the experience lively and enjoyable, making each visit more than just a routine grooming session.

Operating from 10 am to 7 pm, AMG Barbershop accommodates various schedules, ensuring accessibility for all. The convenient hours make it easy to fit in a trim or a full grooming session, even on busy days.

The location adds to the appeal, situated in the heart of the West Village. Whether you're a local resident or just passing through, AMG Barbershop offers a convenient and welcoming retreat for all your grooming needs.

Overall, AMG Barbershop comes highly recommended. With skilled barbers like Manye, a vibrant atmosphere, convenient hours, and a prime location, it's a cut above the rest. Don't just take my word for it—swing by and experience it for yourself.

originalText.text: One of the most thorough cuts I’ve had in a while. When I get a buzz most barbers spend five minutes going over once or twice but they spent significant time making sure there wasn’t a single stray hair. Highly recommend. Super friendly as well.

text.text: One of the most thorough cuts I’ve had in a while. When I get a buzz most barbers spend five minutes going over once or twice but they spent significant time making sure there wasn’t a single stray hair. Highly recommend. Super friendly as well.

originalText.text: AMG Barbershop is one of the best barbershops that I’ve come across in NYC. Everything from their services(especially men’s fades) to their cleanliness, professionalism, availability and prices are great. I’ve personally been getting my haircut by Lev for over 5 years and have always had a great experience. I highly recommend AMG.
